item.title: APU Air Intake Door Actuation System – Door Closed

remarks.para: May be inoperative secured closed provided APU is considered inoperative.

note.para: Additional deferral required – Auxiliary Power Unit (APU).
An auto-generated ACARS message requesting an inflight APU start should be disregarded.

placard.para: Placard APU Control Panel "APU AIR INTAKE DOOR INOP" as appropriate and enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.

numlitem.para: If door positioning is required, manually position as follows:
Remove hydraulic power to left, right and center systems (Ref. Maintenance Manual 29-11-00).
Turn APU master switch to OFF position.
Place FLT CONT SHUTOFF valve switches L, R and C on panel P61 to OFF.
Place STAB TRIM SHUTOFF valve switches C and R on panel P10 to CUTOFF.
Open FLT CONT SHUTOFF TAIL circuit breakers L, C, R (11H17, 11H18, 11H28).
Open STAB TRIM SHUTOFF valve circuit breakers R (11C13) and L (11C12).
Open APU ALTN BAT CONT circuit breaker (11B34).
Open APU BAT APU CONT UNIT circuit breaker on E6 rack in aft equipment center.
Open lower service access door to gain access to actuator from inside aircraft.
Hand crank door actuator to position door.

caution.para: DO NOT OVERTORQUE MANUAL/ELECTRICAL SELECTOR SHAFT AND MANUAL DRIVE. IF RESISTANCE IS FELT, ACTUATOR DAMAGE MAY RESULT. SEE APU INTAKE DOOR ACTUATOR MANUAL OPERATION DECAL ON ACTUATOR.

numlitem.para: Insert 1/4 inch square drive into manual/electrical selector shaft located on the forward end of the actuator. Push inward and rotate counterclockwise (about 90°) until manual drive socket is exposed. Do not exceed 10 pound-inches torque.
Insert square drive into revealed socket and turn counterclockwise to extend actuator and clockwise to retract. Do not exceed 65 pound-inches torque.
Insert square drive into manual/electric selector shaft. Push inward and rotate clockwise until manual drive socket is covered.
Place FLT CONT SHUTOFF valve switches L, R, C to ON.
Close FLT CONT SHUTOFF TAIL circuit breakers L, C, R (11H17, 11H18, 11H28).
Close STAB TRIM SHUTOFF valve circuit breaker R (11C13) and L (11C12).
Place STAB TRIM SHUTOFF valve switches C and R to NORM.
Close APU ALTN BAT CONT circuit breaker (11B34).
Close APU BAT CONT UNIT circuit breaker on E6 rack in aft equipment center.
Close lower access service door.
Secure APU air intake door in position. Open and collar APU INLET DR ACT circuit breaker on E6 rack in aft equipment center.
